oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Bailey, Mrs. E. S., 1907 March 08
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A typescript copy of an original will of Mrs. E. S. Bailey, dated June 12th, 1896, Sharon, Tennessee, Weakley County, citing that she is “revoking two others … one the 10 of June 1895, the other the 15 of September, 1895.” Certified by C. H. Hilliard, County court clerk for Weakley County, that “the above and foregoing will is a true and correct copy made of record in my office, witness my hand and seal of the County this Mar. 6th, 1907.” Illustrates the first page of the document. Bailey’s will was presented for probate on March 8th, 1907. Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Bailey family
